sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import RecommendationDashboard from '../components/RecommendationDashboard'; import DailyChallengeWidget from '../components/DailyChallengeWidget'; import AchievementSystem from '../components/AchievementSystem'; import ProgressVisualization from '../components/ProgressVisualization'; function NewHomePage() { return (
{/* Hero Section with Welcome */}

Welcome to Your SQL Learning Journey

Master SQL with personalized recommendations, intelligent hints, and real-time progress tracking

{/* Top Row: Daily Challenge + Quick Stats */}
{/* Quick Action Buttons */}

üöÄ Quick Actions

Browse All Problems View Detailed Progress Learning Paths
{/* Achievement Preview */}

üèÜ Recent Achievements

View all ‚Üí
{/* Main Content: Recommendations */}
{/* Progress Overview */}

üìä Your Progress Overview

View Full Dashboard
{/* Feature Highlights */}
üí°

Smart Hints

Progressive hints that unlock based on your attempts and provide contextual guidance

üéØ

Personalized Learning

AI-powered recommendations based on your skill level and learning patterns

üìö

Educational Feedback

Transform SQL errors into learning moments with detailed explanations and examples

{/* Learning Path Preview */}

üõ§Ô∏è Your Learning Path

Beginner

üå±

Basic SELECT, WHERE, ORDER BY

75% Complete

Intermediate

üí™

JOINs, Subqueries, GROUP BY

40% Complete

Advanced

üöÄ

Window Functions, CTEs

10% Complete

Expert

üëë

Optimization, Complex Queries

Locked

); } export default NewHomePage;
